beer.name: Munich Dark
beer.description: Harpoon Munich Dark is a blend of dark malts that creates a deeper hue than some other beers brewed in this style. The grains which create a malty chocolate-like flavor also add a warm malty nose that mingles with the subtle hop aroma. This medium bodied beer is balanced quite well with a moderately bitter hop finish.\nThe overall character is rich malt and chocolate balanced with a crisp hop bitterness.
